title: Justify highest 1st ionization energy - Cl or Ar

content.prompt: Which of the following correctly identifies which has the higher first-ionization energy, Cl or Ar, and supplies the best justification?

choices.label: Cl, because of its higher electron affinity
Ar, because of its completely filled valence shell
Ar, because of its higher effective nuclear charge

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
